text: On 5 May 2024, Malaysian football player Faisal Halim was attacked with acid at a mall in Kota Damansara, Petaling Jaya. Faisal Halim got burns on his neck, shoulder, hands, and chest. He had 4 surgeries later at a private hospital. On 22 June 2024, Faisal Halim, recovering from an acid attack, got a surprise visit from former Prime Minister Mahathir Mohamad at his home in Shah Alam. Faisal and his family were very grateful for Mahathir's visit and concern. == References == Category:2024 in association football Category:2020s in Malaysia
title: 2024 Faisal Halim acid attack
